precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options including: 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The desktop context menu is open with the mouse cursor hovering over the 'Properties' option.
The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Appearance" tab selected.
action: Click and drag the mouse from the "Appearance" tab to the "Themes" tab.
expected_results: The "Themes" tab of the "Display Properties" window will become visible.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The preview window will show a blank screen with the text "Windows XP". Options for selecting a screen saver, setting the wait time, and configuring power settings will become available.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is currently displaying a screen saver option other than "(None)".
action: Click on the down arrow of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will expand to display a list of available screen saver options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Power...' button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The screen saver is set to "(None)".
expected_results: The changes to the screen saver settings will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'Power Schemes' tab selected. The 'Turn off hard disks' option should be currently set to 'After 20 mins'.
action: Click the dropdown button for the 'Turn off hard disks' option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with different time options for 'Turn off hard disks' will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close. The "Turn off hard disks" value will update to "After 5 hours".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab.
